nodes.text: This warship was a capital ship used by the Five.

In the cancelled novella Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon, the warship is named the Nil-Apharas (the Pale Slayer), built for the deity Typhojem and was equipped with hypertechnology. It was captained by one of his lieutenants, Si'kranosh.
